import './App.css'; import React, {Component, useState} from "react"; class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { isYellowPlayer: true, backgroundColor: "", disabled: false }; } handleClick = () => { if (this.state.isYellowPlayer === true) { this.setState( { isYellowPlayer: false, backgroundColor: "yellow", disabled: true }); } else { this.setState( { isYellowPlayer: true, backgroundColor: "red", disabled: true }); } } render() { return (

) } } export default App;
